meanings.definition: Capable of being decomposed by bacteria or other living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The biodegradables packaging quickly broke down in the soil.
meanings.sent2: It is important to use biodegradables materials to help protect the environment.
meanings.sent3: The biodegradables bag disappeared like magic after being buried in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like biodegradables, slowly breaking down the barriers between them.
meanings.sent5: The biodegradables leaves crumbled easily in my hands, showing their eco-friendly nature.

meanings.definition: Substances that can be broken down into harmless compounds by natural processes.
meanings.sent1: The company switched to biodegradables for their packaging to reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: Biodegradables are a great alternative to traditional plastics.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome was convinced the biodegradables were talking to him.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like biodegradables, breaking down the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The biodegradables slowly transformed into nutrient-rich soil, benefiting the plants.
